lines.text:
[Upset that she's getting a parking ticket]
You must be new on the force. I'm Torchy Blane of The Sun.
I don't care if you're an eclipse of the sun.

[to Steve]
Why don't you muzzle that girl or marry her!
If you keep getting me into jams like this, you'll cook my goose!

[laughs]
Swell! We'll fatten it up and have it for dinner.

[to Steve as they enter to search an apartment]
Here's the haystack. I hope we find the needle.
Did you know Mr. Craig very well?
Not well enough to stab him.
